https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cmpc2GhqLhxx3Fsvu08DI0ePgWg.jpg A young student falls madly in love with a professor's daughter. Promised by the professor that he will let him marry his daughter if he graduates from university with a law degree, the student works hard and finally succeeds. When the time comes for the professor to fulfill his promise, his daughter suddenly announces that she will marry another... Crazy First Love
